title: Awesome List Updates on Nov 02, 2024

items.title: Awesome Godot
items.content_text:
### Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

*   [Talo (⭐116)](https://github.com/TaloDev/godot) - A self-hostable game backend for managing players, leaderboards, stats, saving/loading data and more.
items.content_html:
Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

  • Talo (⭐116) - A self-hostable game backend for managing players, leaderboards, stats, saving/loading data and more.

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Plugins / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [tmux-sessionizer (⭐2)](https://github.com/nikevsoft/tmux-sessionizer) - [tmux](https://tmux.github.io) sessionizer as seen on ThePrimeagen.
*   [yadm (⭐9)](https://github.com/juanrgon/yadm-zsh) - Displays a warning if there are local `yadm` configuration changes.

### Completions / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [complete-lastf (⭐1)](https://github.com/chougousui/complete-lastf) - Adds a tab completion to select the most recently modified file or directory.

### Themes / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [green-lambda (⭐0)](https://github.com/Ishidawg/minimal-green-lambda) - Minimalist Lambda theme. Includes `git` decorations.
items.content_html:
Plugins / superconsole - Windows-only

  • tmux-sessionizer (⭐2) - tmux sessionizer as seen on ThePrimeagen.
  • yadm (⭐9) - Displays a warning if there are local yadm configuration changes.

Completions / superconsole - Windows-only

  • complete-lastf (⭐1) - Adds a tab completion to select the most recently modified file or directory.

Themes / superconsole - Windows-only

  • green-lambda (⭐0) - Minimalist Lambda theme. Includes git decorations.

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### Form Controls / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-phone-field (⭐1)](https://github.com/alex-mirankov/ngx-phone-field) - An Angular directive that provides international phone input with country flag dropdowns. It integrates with Angular forms, supporting both Reactive Forms and Template-Driven Forms.
*   [ngx-rabe-star (⭐3)](https://github.com/Avotraina/ngx-rabe-star) - An Angular library that provides a customizable star rating component for your Angular application.

### Images / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-img-cropper (⭐193)](https://github.com/web-dave/ngx-img-cropper) - Image cropping tool for Angular.
items.content_html:
Form Controls / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-phone-field (⭐1) - An Angular directive that provides international phone input with country flag dropdowns. It integrates with Angular forms, supporting both Reactive Forms and Template-Driven Forms.
  • ngx-rabe-star (⭐3) - An Angular library that provides a customizable star rating component for your Angular application.

Images / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-img-cropper (⭐193) - Image cropping tool for Angular.

items.title: Awesome Qubes OS
items.content_text:
### Templates

*   [Waydroid template](https://forum.qubes-os.org/t/waydroid-template/23356) - This guide is for setting up minimal Waydroid template.

### Clearnet & Anonymous Networking / OpenVPN

*   [Fedora 40 Minimal(OpenVPN)](https://forum.qubes-os.org/t/fedora-40-minimal-openvpn-qubes-4-2-six-easy-steps/27795) - Qubes 4.2 - Six Easy Steps!

### Kernels / Crypto

*   [Rump (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/rumpkernel/rumprun) - Rump kernels enable you to build the software stack you need without forcing you to reinvent the wheels.

### Kernels / Unikernels

*   [Unikraft](https://unikraft.org/) - Unikraft powers the next-generation of cloud native applications by enabling you to radically customize and build custom OS/kernels, unlocking best-in-class performance, security primitives and efficiency savings.
*   [Unik (⭐2.8k)](https://github.com/solo-io/unik) - A platform for automating unikernel & MicroVM compilation and deployment.
items.content_html:

  • Fedora 40 Minimal(OpenVPN) - Qubes 4.2 - Six Easy Steps!

  • Rump (⭐1.1k) - Rump kernels enable you to build the software stack you need without forcing you to reinvent the wheels.

Kernels / Unikernels

  • Unikraft - Unikraft powers the next-generation of cloud native applications by enabling you to radically customize and build custom OS/kernels, unlocking best-in-class performance, security primitives and efficiency savings.
  • Unik (⭐2.8k) - A platform for automating unikernel & MicroVM compilation and deployment.

items.title: Awesome Osint
items.content_text:
### DNS / GitHub

*   [Amass (⭐13k)](https://github.com/owasp-amass/amass) - The amass tool searches Internet data sources, performs brute force subdomain enumeration, searches web archives, and uses machine learning to generate additional subdomain name guesses. DNS name resolution is performed across many public servers so the authoritative server will see the traffic coming from different locations. Written in Go.
items.content_html:
DNS / GitHub

  • Amass (⭐13k) - The amass tool searches Internet data sources, performs brute force subdomain enumeration, searches web archives, and uses machine learning to generate additional subdomain name guesses. DNS name resolution is performed across many public servers so the authoritative server will see the traffic coming from different locations. Written in Go.

items.title: Awesome Agi Cocosci
items.content_text:
### Methodologies for Experiments / Virtual Reality

*   [What's the Game, then? Opportunities and Challenges for Runtime Behavior Generation](https://dl.acm.org/doi/abs/10.1145/3654777.3676358) - ***UIST'24***, 2024. \[[All Versions](https://github.com/SHI-Yu-Zhe/awesome-agi-cocosci/blob/master/README.md/)]. Procedural content generation (PCG), the process of algorithmically creating game components instead of manually, has been a common tool of game development for decades. Recent advances in large language models (LLMs) enable the generation of game behaviors based on player input at runtime. Such code generation brings with it the possibility of entirely new gameplay interactions that may be difficult to integrate with typical game development workflows. This work explores these implications through GROMIT, a novel LLM-based runtime behavior generation system for Unity. When triggered by a player action, GROMIT generates a relevant behavior which is compiled without developer intervention and incorporated into the game.
items.content_html:
Methodologies for Experiments / Virtual Reality

  • What's the Game, then? Opportunities and Challenges for Runtime Behavior Generation - UIST'24, 2024. [All Versions]. Procedural content generation (PCG), the process of algorithmically creating game components instead of manually, has been a common tool of game development for decades. Recent advances in large language models (LLMs) enable the generation of game behaviors based on player input at runtime. Such code generation brings with it the possibility of entirely new gameplay interactions that may be difficult to integrate with typical game development workflows. This work explores these implications through GROMIT, a novel LLM-based runtime behavior generation system for Unity. When triggered by a player action, GROMIT generates a relevant behavior which is compiled without developer intervention and incorporated into the game.
